description: The smallest of the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard] mobile suits, this reconnaissance model often enters the battlefield ahead of the main force to scout out enemy defenses. The Ebirhu S is equipped with numerous cameras and sensors, and a shoulder-mounted recon pod which can be launched to gather data. It`s also capable of engaging in combat thanks to the weapons built into its left arm, which include a shoulder-mounted grenade rack, a shot lancer, a battery of heavy machine guns, and a unique shot claw device.
name: Ebirhu S
